item.title: Harmony - Life's Essentials standing stones - Katherine's Wood at Lavender Hall Park in Balsall Common
item.description:
ell brown posted a photo:

A visit to Lavender Hall Park in Balsall Common. It is a Local Nature Reserve.


Lavender Hall Park was designated a Local Nature Reserve in 2008.


You would find Katherine's Wood here.


Katherine's Wood was planted with native trees between 2006 and 2008.


Life's Essentials
The Health, Harmony and Happiness standing stones and the Covid-19 memorial stone are at the entrance to the wood.
item.author: nobody@flickr.com (ell brown)
